alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 2:10PM PST until March 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...In the Spring Mountains, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. In lower elevations including the Las Vegas Valley, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph are expected primarily over the far west and southwest portions of the valley. * WHERE...Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Spring Mountains Red Rock Canyon and Las Vegas Valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
